_DummyAttack.NAME: Attack
_DummyAttack.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, the enemy intends to attack.

_DummyNotAttack.NAME: Not Attack
_DummyNotAttack.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, the enemy does not intend to attack.

Alleviate.NAME: Alleviate
Alleviate.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to 3 cards. NL Gain !B! Block for each card you discard.

Barrier.NAME: Barrier
Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, NL gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust.

BorrowedTime.NAME: Borrowed Time
BorrowedTime.DESCRIPTION: Draw 5 cards. NL Gain [B] [B] [B]. NL Next turn, draw NL !M! less cards and NL lose [B] [B] [B]. NL Exhaust.
BorrowedTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 5 cards. NL Gain [B] [B] [B]. NL Next turn, draw NL !M! less cards and NL lose [B] [B]. NL Exhaust.

ParthianShot.NAME: Parthian Shot
ParthianShot.DESCRIPTION: Throw 1 Knife that deals !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block.

Comet.NAME: Comet
Comet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have not played any card this turn, draw !M! cards.

CosmicInflation.NAME: Cosmic Inflation
CosmicInflation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Place a copy of this card on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

DWeaponry.NAME: D. Weaponry
DWeaponry.DESCRIPTION: At the start NL of your turn, NL obtain !M! Knives. NL (D stands for Dimensional.)

Deny.NAME: Deny
Deny.DESCRIPTION: Look at your NL draw pile. NL You may discard NL up to !M! cards.

DoubleEdge.NAME: Double Edge
DoubleEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Backlash 2.

DualDimension.NAME: Dual Dimension
DualDimension.DESCRIPTION: Double your Knives. NL Exhaust. NL Shift: Gain !M! Protection.

Duplication.NAME: Duplication
Duplication.DESCRIPTION: Duplicate !M! card(s). NL The duplicate(s) NL cost 0 this turn. NL Backlash 3. NL Exhaust.

Enbodiment.NAME: Enbodiment
Enbodiment.DESCRIPTION: At the end your turn, add a random Temporal card to your draw pile.
Enbodiment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end your turn, add a random Upgraded Temporal card to your draw pile.

Defy.NAME: Defy
Defy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You are not influenced by Weak, Vulnerable and Frail for 1 turn.

FanOfKnives.NAME: Fan of Knives
FanOfKnives.DESCRIPTION: Spend all [B]. NL Throw X Knives at EACH enemy. NL Each knife deals !D! damage.
FanOfKnives.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spend all [B]. NL Throw X+1 Knives at EACH enemy. NL Each knife deals !D! damage.

Farseeing.NAME: Farseeing
Farseeing.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, NL gain [B] and NL draw !M! more cards.

FastForward.NAME: Fast Forward
FastForward.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If there is no Attack in your hand, draw !M! cards.

Ricochet.NAME: Ricochet
Ricochet.DESCRIPTION: Throw a Knife that deals !D! damage and bounces between enemies !M! times.

FlawlessForm.NAME: Flawless Form
FlawlessForm.DESCRIPTION: You are not affected by Weak, Vulnerable and Frail.
FlawlessForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL You are not affected by Weak, Vulnerable and Frail.

FloweringNight.NAME: Flowering Night
FloweringNight.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card whenever you play a card this turn. NL You may only draw !M! extra cards this turn. NL Exhaust.

Initiator.NAME: Initiator
Initiator.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add Follow Up NL to your hand.

FollowUp.NAME: Follow Up
FollowUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add Follow Up 2 NL to your hand. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

FollowUp2.NAME: Follow Up 2
FollowUp2.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add Finishing Touch NL to your hand. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

FinishingTouch.NAME: Finishing Touch
FinishingTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Backlash 3. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

Hightail.NAME: Hightail
Hightail.DESCRIPTION: Spend all [B]. NL Gain !M! Protection NL X time(s). NL Backlash X.
Hightail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spend all [B]. NL Gain !M! Protection NL X+1 time(s). NL Backlash X+1.

DecisiveAttack.NAME: Decisive Attack
DecisiveAttack.DESCRIPTION: Spend all [B]. NL Deal damage equals to X times the number of cards in your hand. NL Discard your hand.
DecisiveAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spend all [B]. NL Deal damage equals to X+1 times the number of cards in your hand. NL Discard your hand.

GarbageDisposal.NAME: Garbage Disposal
GarbageDisposal.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards. NL Gain Dexterity equals to the number of cards you just exhausted. NL Exhaust.

Gouge.NAME: Gouge
Gouge.DESCRIPTION: Spend all [B] . NL Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Blight X times.
Gouge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spend all [B] . NL Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Blight X+1 times.

Haste.NAME: Haste
Haste.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 more card next turn for each Attack card you played this turn. NL Ethereal.
Haste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 more card next turn for each Attack card you played this turn.

Capture.NAME: Capture
Capture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have at least !M! Temporal cards in your draw pile, draw 2 cards.

KidneyShot.NAME: Kidney Shot
KidneyShot.DESCRIPTION: Throw !M! Knives. NL Each deals !D! damage and apply 1 Weak.

KillerInstinct.NAME: Killer Instinct
KillerInstinct.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Block and draw 1 card for each attacking enemy.

KillingDoll.NAME: Killing Doll
KillingDoll.DESCRIPTION: Throw ALL Knives at random enemies. NL Each deals !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

DPassage.NAME: D. Passage
DPassage.DESCRIPTION: Put all cards in your exhaust pile to your draw pile and shuffle. NL Exhaust.

Manipulate.NAME: Manipulate
Manipulate.DESCRIPTION: Adds !M! random Temporal cards to your draw pile.

Misdirection.NAME: Misdirection
Misdirection.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Blight and Weak.

MoonPhase.NAME: Moon Phase
MoonPhase.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block for each stack of Weak, Vulnerable and Frail on you.

Moonlight.NAME: Moonlight
Moonlight.DESCRIPTION: Throw !M! Knives. NL Each deals !D! damage and apply 1 Vulnerable. NL Ethereal.

CannedTime.NAME: Canned Time
CannedTime.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
CannedTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

MurderousAura.NAME: Murderous Aura
MurderousAura.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply 1 Blight to ALL enemies.
MurderousAura.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, apply 1 Blight to ALL enemies.

Read.NAME: Read
Read.DESCRIPTION: Vision: Gain !B! Protection and apply !M! Weak.

Unparalleled.NAME: Unparalleled
Unparalleled.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, take !M! less damage and deal !M! damage to the attacker.

Potential.NAME: Potential
Potential.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shift: Deals !M! additional damage this combat and put this in your hand.

Desolation.NAME: Desolation
Desolation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double the enemy's Blight. NL Exhaust.

Deadline.NAME: Deadline
Deadline.DESCRIPTION: Vision: Apply !M! Blight and Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

RealityMarble.NAME: Reality Marble
RealityMarble.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL All cards lose Ethereal property for this combat.

Replace.NAME: Replace
Replace.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card from your draw pile. NL Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

Reset.NAME: Reset
Reset.DESCRIPTION: Clear ALL Weak, Vulnerable and Frail. NL Each stack gives you 2 Protection.

ReturningBlade.NAME: Returning Blade
ReturningBlade.DESCRIPTION: Vision: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies, put this card in your hand. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

Revamp.NAME: Revamp
Revamp.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards. NL Draw the same amount of cards.

Rewind.NAME: Rewind
Rewind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put the card at the bottom of your discard pile in your hand.

Sabotage.NAME: Sabotage
Sabotage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses Strength equals to the damage for 1 turn. NL Exhaust.

ShiftingGears.NAME: Shifting Gears
ShiftingGears.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Shift: Gain 1 Dexterity.

ShatteredReality.NAME: Shattered Reality
ShatteredReality.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shift: Deal DOUBLE damage NL to ALL enemies.

ShiftingThoughts.NAME: Shifting Thoughts
ShiftingThoughts.DESCRIPTION: Discard the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Shift: gain [B] .

Snipe.NAME: Snipe
Snipe.DESCRIPTION: Vision: Throw a Knife. NL Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

Solidify.NAME: Solidify
Solidify.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Temporal card and place it on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
Solidify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a Upgraded Temporal card and place it on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.

SoulSculpture.NAME: Soul Sculpture
SoulSculpture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL six times. NL Enemy loses NL !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

SpecialFormula.NAME: Special Formula
SpecialFormula.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength. NL Gain 2 Dexterity. NL Backlash !M!. NL Exhaust.

Spin.NAME: Spin
Spin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Backlash 2.

StarChef.NAME: Star Chef
StarChef.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you may exhaust 1 card and thereby gain [B].
StarChef.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, you may exhaust 1 card and thereby gain [B].

Starlight.NAME: Starlight
Starlight.DESCRIPTION: Throw !M! Knives at random enemies. NL Each deals !D! damage and apply 1 Blight. NL Ethereal.

StressReliever.NAME: Stress Reliever
StressReliever.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, look at the NL top !M! cards of NL your draw pile. NL You may discard NL any of them.

Sunlight.NAME: Sunlight
Sunlight.DESCRIPTION: Throw a Knife. NL Deals !D! damage NL to ALL enemies. NL Ethereal.

SurpressingFire.NAME: Surpressing Fire
SurpressingFire.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each Knife you Throw.

TimeTheft.NAME: Time Theft
TimeTheft.DESCRIPTION: Vision: Gain [B] [B] [B] . Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

TemporalDefense.NAME: Temporal Defense
TemporalDefense.DESCRIPTION: Temporal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

TemporalEssence.NAME: Temporal Essence
TemporalEssence.DESCRIPTION: Temporal. NL Gain [B] and draw !M! cards.
TemporalEssence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Temporal. NL Gain [B] [B] and draw !M! cards.

TemporalMisd.NAME: Temporal Misd.
TemporalMisd.DESCRIPTION: Temporal. NL Apply !M! Blight and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

TemporalSlicing.NAME: Temporal Slicing
TemporalSlicing.DESCRIPTION: Temporal. NL Deal !D! damage twice to ALL enemies.

TheWorld.NAME: The World
TheWorld.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL The next card you play this turn costs 0. Exhaust.

TimeEmbedded.NAME: Time Embedded
TimeEmbedded.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Protection. Shift: Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

TimeWarp.NAME: Time Warp
TimeWarp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shift: Draw !M! card(s) and discard !M! card(s).

TrashToTreasure.NAME: Trash To Treasure
TrashToTreasure.DESCRIPTION: Return !M! card from your discard pile to your hand and upgrade it. NL Exhaust.
TrashToTreasure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return !M! card from your discard pile to your hand and upgrade it.

TrueSight.NAME: True Sight
TrueSight.DESCRIPTION: Vision effects will always be triggered.
TrueSight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Vision effects will always be triggered.

Unruled.NAME: Unruled
Unruled.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each stack of Weak, Vulnerable and Frail on you, deal !M! additional damage.

Unsheathe.NAME: Unsheathe
Unsheathe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL !M! times. NL Backlash !M!.
